ä½¿ç”¨ç äº‘çš„pageséƒ¨ç½²hexoé™æ€åšå®¢ä»¥åï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡å†™å®Œéƒ½è¦å»æ‰‹åŠ¨æ›´æ–°ï¼Œå®åœ¨æ˜¯éº»çƒ¦ã€‚å½“ç„¶åªè¦å¼€ä¼šå‘˜ï¼Œè¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜æ ¹æœ¬ä¸å«é—®é¢˜ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œå¯¹äºä¸€ä¸ªè‡ªèº«ç™½å«–å…šè€Œè¨€ï¼Œä¸å¯èƒ½çš„ï¼Œè¿™è¾ˆå­ä¹Ÿä¸å¯èƒ½çš„ã€‚

æ‰€ä»¥ï¼Œåªèƒ½è‡ªåŠ›æ›´ç”Ÿã€è‰°è‹¦å¥‹æ–—äº†ã€‚

äºŒã€æƒ³æ³•

åˆ©ç”¨seleniumç¼–å†™pythonè„šæœ¬ï¼Œå®ç°æ¨¡æ‹Ÿç™»å½•æ›´æ–°ï¼Œè¿™æ ·å°±ä¸ç”¨äº†æ¯æ¬¡éƒ½è‡ªå·±ç™»å½•ç äº‘ï¼Œç„¶åæ‰‹åŠ¨æ›´æ–°äº†ã€‚

from selenium import webdriverfrom selenium.webdriver import ChromeOptionsfrom selenium.webdriver.common.by import Byfrom selenium.webdriver.support.ui import WebDriverWaitfrom selenium.webdriver.support import expected_conditions as EC# åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯username = 'xxxx'  # è´¦å·password = 'xxxx'     # å¯†ç pickname = 'xxxx'   # ç”¨æˆ·årepo = 'xxxx'       # ä»“åº“ådriver = r'D:\Desktop\chromedriver.exe'     # è°·æ­Œé©±åŠ¨çš„è·¯å¾„options = ChromeOptions()options.add_argument("--headless")      # ä¸æ˜¾ç¤ºç•Œé¢options.add_argument("--start-maximized")       # çª—å£æœ€å¤§åŒ–options.add_argument("--disable-plugins")       # ç¦æ­¢æ‰©å±•chrome = webdriver.Chrome(executable_path=driver, options=options)chrome.get('https://gitee.com/login')# è¾“å…¥ç”¨æˆ·åã€å¯†ç ï¼Œç™»å½•username_input = chrome.find_element_by_id("user_login")password_input=  chrome.find_element_by_id("user_password")login_btn = chrome.find_element_by_name("commit")username_input.send_keys(username)password_input.send_keys(password)login_btn.click()# ç­‰å¾…é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®ŒæˆWebDriverWait(chrome, 5).until(EC.presence_of_all_elements_located((By.CLASS_NAME, "ml-1")))# è·³è½¬åˆ°pageé¡µé¢chrome.get('https://gitee.com/' + pickname + '/' + repo + '/pages')# ç­‰å¾…é¡µé¢åŠ è½½å®ŒæˆWebDriverWait(chrome, 5).until(EC.presence_of_all_elements_located((By.CLASS_NAME, "update_deploy")))# æ‰§è¡Œjsä»£ç ï¼Œä½¿é¡µé¢å‘ä¸‹æ»šåŠ¨chrome.execute_script("window.scrollTo(100, document.body.scrollHeight);")# ç‚¹å‡»æ›´æ–°æŒ‰é’®update_btn = chrome.find_element_by_class_name("update_deploy")update_btn.click()# ç‚¹å‡»ç¡®è®¤æ¡†alert = chrome.switch_to.alertalert.accept()print('gitee pages æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ'.center(40, '-'))chrome.quit()

entry.title: äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„å…ˆåºéå†ã€ä¸­åºéå†å’Œååºéå†
entry.content:
ä¸€ã€å‰è¨€

äºŒå‰æ ‘æ˜¯ä¸€ç§éå¸¸é‡è¦çš„æ•°æ®æœºæ„ï¼Œå¯¹æ ‘èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„è®¿é—®æ–¹å¼åŒ…æ‹¬äº†æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†ï¼ˆDFSï¼‰å’Œå¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†ï¼ˆBFSï¼‰ã€‚å…¶ä¸­æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†åŒ…æ‹¬äº†å…ˆåºéå†ã€ä¸­åºéå†å’Œååºéå†ï¼Œå¹¿åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†ä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯å±‚æ¬¡éå†ã€‚ä¸‹è¾¹åªè®²æ·±åº¦ä¼˜å…ˆéå†çš„è¿™ä¸‰ç§ã€‚

äºŒã€ä¸‰ç§éå†æ–¹å¼çš„åŒºåˆ«

å…ˆä¸Šå¼ äºŒå‰æœç´¢æ ‘ï¼ˆBinary Search Treeï¼‰å›¾

1. å…ˆåºéå†

  • éå†æ–¹å¼ï¼šæ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ -> å·¦å­æ ‘ -> å³å­æ ‘

  • éå†ç»“æœï¼š5214367

2. ä¸­åºéå†

  • éå†æ–¹å¼ï¼šå·¦å­æ ‘ -> æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹ -> å³å­æ ‘
  • éå†ç»“æœï¼š1234567

3. ååºéå†

  • éå†æ–¹å¼ï¼šå·¦å­æ ‘ -> å³å­æ ‘ -> æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹
  • éå†ç»“æœï¼š1342765

ä¸‰ã€Pythonå®ç°

äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„å®ç°ä»£ç 

class TreeNode(object):    """    å®šä¹‰äºŒå‰æ ‘èŠ‚ç‚¹    """    def __init__(self, x):        self.val = x        self.left = None        self.right = None

1. å…ˆåºéå†

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰ é€’å½’å®ç°
class Solution(object):    """é€’å½’å®ç°äºŒå‰æ ‘çš„"""    def preorder(self, p):        """        :type p: äºŒå‰æ ‘æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹        """        # ä¿å­˜éå†ç»“æœ        result = []        self.recursion(result, p)        return result    def recursion(self, result, root):        # èŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸ºNone        if not root:            return         result.append(root.val)        # å…ˆéå†å·¦å­æ ‘å†éå†å³å­æ ‘        self.recursion(result, root.left)        self.recursion(result, root.right)
ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰éé€’å½’å®ç°
class Solution(object):    """éé€’å½’å®ç°å…ˆåºéå†"""    def preorder(self, p):        # ä¿å­˜éå†ç»“æœ        result = []        # ä¸´æ—¶ä¿å­˜èŠ‚ç‚¹        stack = []        while p or stack:            # èŠ‚ç‚¹éNone            while p:                result.append(p.val)                stack.append(p)                p = p.left            p = stack.pop()            p = p.right        return result

2. ä¸­åºéå†

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰é€’å½’å®ç°
class Solution(object):    def midorder(self, p):        # ä¿å­˜éå†ç»“æœ        result = []        self.recursion(result, p)        return result    def recursion(self, result, p):        if not p:            return         self.recursion(result, p.left)        result.append(p.val)        self.recursion(result, p.right)
ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰éé€’å½’å®ç°
class Solution(object):    def unrecursion(self, p):        # ä¿å­˜éå†ç»“æœ        result = []        # ä¸´æ—¶ä¿å­˜èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ ˆ        stack = []        while p or stack:            while p:                stack.append(p)                p = p.left            p = stack.pop()            result.append(p.val)            p = p.right        return result

3ã€ååºéå†

ï¼ˆ1ï¼‰é€’å½’å®ç°
class Solution(object):    def post_order(self, root):        result = []        self.recursion(result, root)        return result    def recursion(self, result, root):        if not root:            return        self.recursion(result, root.left)        self.recursion(result, root.right)        result.append(root.val)    def unrecursion(self, root):        """        type root: æ ‘æ ¹èŠ‚ç‚¹        éé€’å½’        """        # ä¿å­˜éå†ç»“æœ        result = []        stack = []        stack.append(root)        while stack:            n = stack.pop()            if n.left:                stack.append(n.left)            if n.right:                stack.append(n.right)            # ä¿å­˜çš„ç»“æœä¸ºæ ¹å³å·¦            result.append(n.val)        return result[::-1]

å±‚æ¬¡éå†

class Solution(object):    def level(self, root):        # ä¿å­˜éå†ç»“æœ        result = []        # ä¸´æ—¶ä¿å­˜èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„é˜Ÿåˆ—        queue = []        queue.append(root)        while queue:            root = queue.pop(0)            if root.left:                queue.append(root.left)            if root.right:                root.append(root.right)        return result

ä¸‰ã€å…·ä½“æ­¥éª¤ï¼ˆè‡ªå·±ä¹Ÿè®°å½•ä¸€ä¸‹ï¼Œå…å¾—ç”¨å¾—ç€çš„æ—¶å€™æ¥å›ç¿»ï¼‰

åœ¨å¾€ä¸‹æ“ä½œä¹‹å‰ï¼Œå‡è®¾ä½ å·²ç»æœ‰äº†office E5è®¢é˜…ã€‚

    è¿™äº›æƒé™å…¨éƒ¨å‹¾é€‰å¥½ä»¥åï¼Œç‚¹å‡»åº•éƒ¨çš„æ·»åŠ æƒé™ï¼Œè¿™æ—¶å€™ä¼šè¿”å›åˆ°APIæƒé™ç•Œé¢ï¼Œç„¶åä¸€å®šè¦ç‚¹ä»£è¡¨XXXæˆäºˆç®¡ç†å‘˜åŒæ„ã€‚

2. è·å–refresh token

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing

Run server

$ hexo server

More info: Server

Generate static files

$ hexo generate

More info: Generating

Deploy to remote sites

$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
